tracersÂ¶

Tracing algorithms for the survey estimation project.

This package contains various tracer implementations:

  • BaseTracer: Base class for implementing different tracing algorithms with caching capabilities

  • DeterministicTracer: Deterministic tracer that uses a predefined pipeline for tracing

  • DLTracer: Deep learning tracer that uses neural networks for image tracing with splitting capabilities

These tracers provide different approaches for generating tracing masks from images.

AxonSurvey
